case.state: Guzma, the criminal mastermind behind Team Skull?! Jus...- *ahem* -Just what are your intentions here, Guzma?
I'm a trainer, a researcher, a mythologist, and Pokémon League Champion; but you may call me Cynthia.
My name is Cynthia, Sinnoh League Champion. But for this occasion, I'm just a poker player like you, ~player~.
Yes, your eyes are not deceiving you. I am the Cynthia from the Sinnoh region, but I'm here for a simple game of strip poker.
I may be a league champion but I'm no poker master... Oh, let me introduce myself first. My name is Cynthia. Pleasure to meet you.
This place is fascinating, so foreign but it feels familiar... Oh, look at me ramble! As an introduction, I'm Cynthia, from Celestic Town in the Sinnoh region.
Guzma, the criminal mastermind behind Team Skull?! Jus...- *ahem* -Just what are your intentions here, Guzma?
Don't worry about that, Shamir. I can assure you that I am very humble about my status as the Regional Champion.
Guzma... I have no child named Verity. As a matter of fact, I'm not a mother at all. How dare you spread malicious lies about me!
Those are lies manufactured to ruin my image! I know you're not a paragon of virtue, but I never thought you'd stoop that low!
Oh, Misty? Fancy meeting you here! You're from Kanto, aren't you?
Oh, Misty? Fancy meeting you here! I didn't expect to come across a gym leader here.
Oh, Misty! It's a bit embarrassing, buuuut... I thought I would see some guys here.
Oh, Misty, it's nice meeting you... but where are the men?... I figured I'd meet some here...
Oh, Misty? Fancy meeting you here! You're from Kanto, aren't you?
Oh, Misty? Fancy meeting you here! I didn't expect to come across a gym leader here.
Oh, Misty! It's a bit embarrassing, buuuut... I heard ~male~ was playing, and I figured I could see something nice.
Oh, Misty, it's nice meeting you... and I can see ~male~ is present as well. This would be fun, I can feel it already.
I know a great deal about witchcraft from my studies of mythology, Akko, but I can assure you I am not one...
I... act like a witch? Why ever do you say so, Akko?
I dress like a witch? I've read that broomsticks and pointy hats are only silly modern portrayals, but... how do I look like one?
An angel?! This is what I've been waiting for! This is the perfect opportunity to further my mythological research!
An angel! Ah, I must ask you some questions!
An angel? An angel from my mythology books is here?
What?! An angel? Oh I have so many questions to ask you!
Wait, an angel! This is the opportunity of a lifetime! Please, I must ask you some questions...
An angel? B-but I thought those were... just myths...
An angel? You mean... the myths were true?
An angel? Are you real, or a figment of my imagination?... You're not a hallucination. Astounding!
Angels appear now and then in the creation myths I've studied, but to meet one in the flesh...
An angel... in front of me?! This has massive implications on the creation myths of this world!
An angel from Skyworld? Ah, it's just like in the mythology books!
An angel from Skyworld? Your race comes up often in my books, Pit. It may be embarrassing to say, but I've read so much about your people!
From Skyworld? I've read so much about Skyworld!
Oh, Chazz! Well, this works out perfectly then! I was hoping to speak to a Monster Duelist; maybe I can learn something about the mythology of this card game...
Oh, Chazz, right? I was hoping I could learn a thing or two about the creation of your Duel Monsters card game... Would you mind informing me?
Oh, hello Elesa! Fancy seeing you here.
Oh, Elesa! Long time no see, right? How's life been treating you?
Ah, Elesa! It's been a while since you paid me a visit at my villa; is anything new?
Well, well, well. I didn't expect to see a familiar face here. What brings you here, Elesa?
Well hello there, everybody! Are we ready to begin? I'm looking forward to how this match may develop, ~male~.
Let the best player win! I'm keeping a close eye on you, ~male~... Wait, I-I m-meant... I-I see you as a formidable opponent, is all.
Best of luck, ~male~! I won't be going easy on you in this game.
Wait, huh? There's no men here... I thought... I only joined because... Well, never mind that. Let's get this battle started!
Hold on just a second, where are the men?... This is going to be an all-female game?... I suppose that would be adequate entertainment...
Wait, we're all women here... I figured we'd be playing with some men... Let's begin this game, shall we?
Hello, gentlemen... Ready for a challenge? I might not be a champion at poker, but I know my way through this game.
Well, on to the game then. I might be a woman, but that doesn't mean I'll be a pushover. I might just surprise all of you.
It's a pleasure to have the opportunity to play with you gentlemen...
I see that the travel here wasn't for naught: there are some men playing as I had hoped. I-I m-mean, as a personal challenge.
You know what they say: sometimes it's better to be lucky than good.
I don't mean to gloat, but my cards are already perfect.
Well, it seems I don't need to exchange any cards at all.
Oh, dear. I'm going to exchange all my cards, dealer.
Oh... what an underwhelming batch. I'll replace all 5 of my cards, dealer.
Could this be? I can't use any of these cards. I need a new batch.
I'll just swap out... ~cards~.
~Cards~ please...
Give me some good ones, dealer.
I'll trade these in...
Come on dealer, let's see what you got for me.
Let me see... I need ~cards~ new ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, dealer.
I think I need to exchange ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for this round.
This ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ could certainly be better.
I need to exchange ~cards.ifPlural(these ~cards~|this card)~.
~Cards~ cards, please.
This is just like a Pokémon battle; I like to start off with my Spiritomb so that I don't start at a disadvantage.
Ah! Looks like we're off to a good start!
I'm off to a good start!
Why, what a remarkable way to start this journey!
Hah! As expected...
Ah, a hand fit for a champion!
A critical hit!
An upturn in fortune! How splendid...
I used to have so much fun while I was out adventuring... If only times could be so simple again.
It seems I might have a bit of an undefeated streak going on.
My perfect streak will remain intact this round, I would wager.
It's a long game anyway. I'm sure you can all afford to wait at least another round before I have to strip.
This might be a long game for you ~player~, if my luck keeps up like this.
Why, what a remarkable way to start this journey!
Would you look at that; perfect IVs!
Hehe, I'm having a good time right now...
These cards are quite the discovery!
I must say, this game has been going swimmingly for me so far.
Oh, just the kind of hand I've been waiting for!
I suppose I was due for a good hand eventually...
So I guess all the good cards were stuffed at the bottom of the deck...
I might be down, but this hand shows that I'm not out yet.
Looks like I'm still safe... but is ~male~?
Looks like I might be safe this round; maybe ~male~ will have to show us something nice?
Where was this hand a few rounds ago...
Oh, so now the good cards come to me...
It seems I'll be spared for at least another round...
Better late than never, I suppose. I hope it's not too little, too late.
I'm finally hitting my stride in this game.
An upturn in fortune! How splendid...
Hands like this are such a rare encounter!
Yeah, I think these cards go together well...
I just knew that exchange was the correct call.
Ah, these are just the cards I needed.
This hand is just too perfect; I'm gonna blush.
Ha! Type advantage!
It's never too late for a great hand.
A good hand is always a welcome sight.
Hopefully this is a good omen of things to come...
An upturn in fortune, and at just the right time too!
I couldn't be more blessed right now; to have this hand, and at this stage in the game too...
Well, this is enough to keep me from exposing myself, at least for now.
It was crucial that I got a good hand this round; I couldn't allow myself another loss...
Yes! Full restore!
Huhah! Perfect timing!
I may be naked, but I'm not yielding!
My years as the Sinnoh League Champion has taught me to remain calm and composed during the heat of the battle.
What do you say: after this game, does anyone want to explore any ruins with me?
Does anyone have any juicy historical stories to share? I love hearing about the past.
I have to ask... Does anyone want to share which historical figures they most admire?
I've been thinking about something... Which events in history do you think were the most impactful today?
I've been researching accounts of our creation; some sound very plausible, others are quite ridiculous... What outrageous theories have you guys heard?
I know mythology is supposed to be a professional subject, but let's be real... We've all admired the lewd artifacts... Does anyone have any favorites?
The juicier bits of history always seem to be the parts we aren't supposed to know, like a ruler's sex life... Does anyone know any gossip like this?
This hand... So it's a fair fight!
There's no type advantage this time; it all comes down to strategy!
I should learn about the origins of this game... I'm sure strip poker has a long and interesting history!
This is why poker is very exciting: the element of uncertainty that dominates the atmosphere.
It's not always about the cards you are dealt; it's how you use them!
A great trainer can turn even an ordinary hand into a victory.
This round, it will be a battle of skill!
It is the duty of a champion to extract the full potential out of her Pokémon. Same goes for poker.
Sometimes, ordinariness can be most beautiful.
It times like this when I remember that anything plain can be lovely.
Right, let's see how this goes!
Not bad... This could be good enough, or it might not be. Who knows?
Not bad, not bad...
I can work with this!
As a Pokémon trainer, I'm more than accustomed to using what I have to my fullest advantage!
I always enjoy facing a good challenge.
Sometimes a victory is won by getting a strong start; other times, you must work from behind and pull ahead!
The interesting thing about my Spiritomb is that it has no weaknesses; it is never at a disadvantage!
A cool and composed demeanor is always optimal for any challenges you're facing.
Due to the way poker works, nobody is truly safe from losing, regardless of what pair you may have.
Hmmm... So I might be fine...
Yes... yes, this could work...
One necessary characteristic for a Pokémon trainer is the ability to remain calm and collected despite the circumstances.
I suppose under these circumstances, this combination should be enough to keep me safe.
I-I can make this work... I have to make this work.
Well, there's still hope, anyway.
Was playing it safe the correct decision? I suppose I could have been more daring with my exchange...
(This might be a good time to practice my poker face.)
I can't settle for these cards... Not when I'm on my last legs...
Under normal circumstances, these cards would be acceptable...
These cards are... fine... But they're not what I was looking for.
This hand might be good enough... But it might not be...
I was hoping for better cards... but I can still make these work.
When I'm this close to defeat, I don't think okay will be enough...
Sometimes good enough just doesn't cut it...
My fate is out of my control now.
There won't be any letup from me!
What little dignity I have left is now in the hands of luck.
Wish me luck in this... I would need all of them.
Ha, I don't think I'd mind some alcohol right about now...
Hey, uh... Misato? ... Got any for me?
Oh, Misato... Do you happen to have any more of that? I think I'll need it...
Hey, Misato? Um... My hand's pretty bad... Think you could give me a sip of that?
To be this far down and have a hand like this... It is most unsettling...
To be this far down and at such a disadvantage... Where did I go wrong?
Things seem to have taken a turn for the worst...
It seems my tale may be taking a darker turn...
(Hmmm... I might be losing my first hand here...)
(My coat might have to go...)
I... I can still make this work... probably...
Now's your chance, ~player~! I have a pretty bad hand, so this is your opportunity to strike!
(Hmmm... I might be losing yet again...)
It seems like my luck has taken a downturn...
It seems a defeat is imminent...
Am I about to be... bested?
Now's your chance, ~player~! I have a pretty bad hand, so this is your chance to strike!
My hand isn't the best, ~player~. This is your opportunity!
I keep telling people that we need to be keeping a closer eye on Team Galactic, but no one seems to want to listen...
I might have made a strategic mistake on that exchange...
This is going from bad to worse...
Man, this luck is something else...
Just like catching a Pokémon with bad IVs...
Remember, even if you're down on your luck, you can always make a comeback!
Such a bad hand? That's fine, I enjoy the challenge.
This hand... It isn't great.
So I'm cursed with a bad hand? Is this some sort of a handicap?
It appears that I'll have to win this hand through skill alone.
My hand isn't the best, ~player~. This is your opening; make it count!
Huh? This hand? Really? N-not now...
But... but with this hand... and this much clothing left, that means...
No... it can't be... Why did I get this now?
I knew the risks of this game... but I never I thought I'd actually experience it.
I can't believe I've fallen this far!
This... this might be nearing an end for me...
I can't go down like this!
Ah, this slip up! This is something I cannot afford...
I've made mistakes at battles before, but this... this is much worse.
It seems the pressure is finally getting to my head.
No! I can't... I can't let it end like this...
Ah, is the curtain about to close on me...?
Might this be the end? My final battle?
I can't seem to remember... when's the last time I've been backed into a corner?
Where's a full restore when you need one...?
Have my years as the Sinnoh League Champion left me too proud and vulnerable to hubris?
So, Pit, first things first... Are you a flying type? A fairy type? ... Maybe a normal and fairy dual type?
Gosh, I'm sorry, Kazuma... That was inappropriate of me to say. My apologies.
Uh... that wasn't right for me to say, Kazuma... I'm sorry for bringing that up.
So, first things first, Pit...Tell me about the Pokémon of Skyworld.
It's not a dark secret, Jessie, but I haven't told anyone what region my house is located at. Not even my own grandparents.
I don't really have any dark, Jessie, but my biggest secret is the location of my house. I've never told anyone which region it is in.
I've had to tell little lies to comfort people. What people don't tell you about being a Champion is that you ruin a kid's dream every time you win.
Some people just can't handle defeat, and I need to tell a sweet lie to comfort them. It's especially heartbreaking when I'm battling against children.
I don't smoke, Jessie. I really dislike the smell, and it doesn't come off easily for dry-clean-only fabric.
I try to avoid cigarette smoke as much as I can, Jessie. Aside from the adverse health effects, the smell also sticks to this type of fabric.
I'm close to my family, especially to my grandma. I visit their home every once in a while, although my busy schedule is making it more difficult.
I like visiting my family in Celestic Town when I have the time. My younger sister and I are very close, and I have a lot to talk about with my grandma.
I'd spend it all in improvements for the Cultural Research Center back at Celestic Town, Jessie. It would cover for the loss of Cyrus's funding.
A large portion of it is going towards the Celestic Town Cultural Research Center. The rest could be used for further excavations around Sinnoh.
If by "stupid mistakes", you meant minor ones, then I don't see the point of holding a grudge against that. Just live and forget about it.
If it's just a small, relatively harmless mistake, then it would be better to just let it blow over. We shouldn't make a mountain out of a mole hill.
I... I suppose having the lights on would be more romantic, not to mention more convenient.
Wouldn't having the lights off be difficult and awkward? Having the lights on seem to be... the more convenient option for me.
This might be surprising for all of you, but I haven't done either of those, Jessie, let alone at the same time.
I... I haven't slept around, Jessie. I haven't dated anyone either, for that matter.
That sounds horrible, Jessie! I wouldn't be able to recover if I get betrayed like that!
I would be heartbroken if that happened to me, Jessie! All the emotional investment, squandered like that...
Masturbation... while in a relationship...? Isn't that only for single people?
Why would you masturbate when you already have a partner? Isn't that one of the benefits of being with a partner?
I don't watch porn films, Jessie, but... this is so embarrassing to admit, I read smut once a week.
I prefer written porn over visual porn... but if you really want to know... I'd say about I read once every week.
It's more of the emotional experience than the number that matters to me, so I would say one per day would be enough.
I suppose doing it once everyday would be good... The number doesn't really matter to me, as long as it's fulfilling.
It would be lovely if we could face each other and stare at each other's eyes. That might just make me melt.
I would prefer sex to be an emotional bonding experience. Having our faces within kissing distance of each other is perfect.
Do you mean anal sex, Jessie? The thought of having a penis penetrate my anal cavity is very appalling.
Having an erect penis pass through my anus? I cannot figure out which part of that experience is supposed to be pleasurable.
Oh, I don't do the battling myself, Megumin. I have my Pokémon battle for me, and it's a sport rather than a war. You could say they have magical properties.
I'm not that old, Megumin. I suppose I could be somewhat of an older sister for you.
I'm a Pokémon trainer, Dust. I participate in competitions where my Pokémon battle with the Pokémon of other trainers. I've been Champion for years now.
That's what you get for randomly entering summer villas in Undella Town. Should have just stayed at your home, kid.
In order to get to know each other better as Pokémon Trainers, I would like our Pokémon to have a match. Would you care to be my opponent, Suction Cup Man?
I don't think that's necessary, Jessie. I'm sure ~player~ can adjust himself just fine. Besides, it looks like he's almost finished adjusting.
That wouldn't be necessary, Jessie, as it seems ~player~ is almost done with his adjustment. Let's focus on the game now, shall we?
I'm all up for trying new things, but anal sex is a step too far for me, Jessie. It's simply off-limits for me.
There's a lot of sexual activities that I might be willing to try out with a partner, but anal sex isn't one of them.
I'm not hiding any secrets in my house, Jessie, I just don't want some of my fanatics disturbing my home.
It's not that I'm hiding something, Jessie, it's just that I want my house undisturbed, which would be difficult when my fans know about it's location.
Being famous can be difficult sometimes, since you're always on the spotlight wherever you go.
I do wish I can take a break from the public eye every once in a while. Having everybody fawn over you can be tiring sometimes.
My grandma is also an archaeologist. She's one of the most well-respected archaeologists in Sinnoh, in fact, with a lot of studies to her name.
Grandma is a veteran archaeologist, having been a leading figure in archaeology in Sinnoh since before I was even born.
You're correct, Jessie. When I was a child, Grandma would bring on tours of the Cultural Research Center.
I've been fascinated with archaeology as far as I can remember, Jessie. Grandma would bring me to digs when I was a child.
Is that so, Jessie? I suppose I can try it... but I do think having the lights on would be a bit more romantic.
Well, you're the expert at this matter, Jessie, so I'll take your word for it. I'd still prefer having lights on since it's more romantic.
Oh... that's... nice to hear, Jessie. (Too much information for me.)
Some of those children have wanted all their life to become the Champion, and I'm preventing them from achieving it. Most of my battles aren't even close.
Every young trainer dreams of defeating the Champion. I've beaten dozen upon dozen of those young trainers, and most of those battles were curb-stomps.
I know, Jessie, but it doesn't make it any less sad. I've heard that some kids rely on it for their future.
That might be true, Jessie, but I've heard some truly sad stories. I heard that there was this boy that's been traveling for 20 years and still haven't won.
Come to think of it, there are some situations that would necessitate that, Jessie. Still, I don't think I can do it myself. I'd rather wait for the perfect mood.
It's part museum, and part library of relics and manuscripts found in Celestic Town, particularly the Celestic Ruins, Jessie. It's a very special place for me.
It's where the artifacts found in Celestic Town are studied, displayed, and stored, Jessie. It's perfect if you want to see relics from the past.
I don't want to share his love, though. I want it all for myself. What's even the point of being in a relationship otherwise?
I prefer monogamous relationships, Jessie. The thought that my partner is fooling around with someone else is sickening.
I think we're done with this conversation, Jessie.
It might be better to just drop this subject before it gets worse, Jessie.
I enjoy reading the very romantic stories, the ones which have multiple chapters of relationship building and wholesome sex scenes.
I like it when stories devote multiple chapters to the characters getting closer to each other, and the sex scenes are gentle and romantic.
... I've been reading those types of books for many years now, Jessie. I can't really imagine my tastes changing soon.
... I wouldn't bet on that happening, Jessie... My choice of smut hasn't changed since I began reading.
... I don't think I'd be able to handle all of that, Jessie... I'm not even sure if I can handle one at all...
Let's not get carried away... Jessie... I think one is the most my body can handle... maybe not even one...
I wasn't thinking of tongue-kissing at all. I was talking about tender, heartfelt kissing.
That... that wasn't what I was about! I was describing more of soft, tender kissing.
... I think I'll just stick with the no-tongue kiss, Jessie. I wouldn't want to things to get... too messy.
Well... I've been pretty busy with my workload for a long time... and talking to men my age isn't really my specialty...
... Let's just say that my line of work makes it difficult to meet men my age... and I'm not exactly proficient in starting relationships...
J-Jessie! I'm not looking for a one-night stand! I'm looking for a man to have a long-term relationship with!
T-that's not what I want, J-Jessie! I want to take things slowly and start a permanent relationship, not go out with a fling!
... I appreciate the concern, Jessie... but I think I can handle myself just fine... I can get into a relationship without needing help...
... I can take things from here, Jessie... I do know how to form relationship... I just haven't been able to try...
I've seen a lot of messy affairs caused by long-lasting grudges... but it's better that we not talking about it in a game like this...
I know some people that have been holding grudges for a long, long time... This isn't a good time to bring it up, so let's just forget about this topic.
On the contrary, playing classical music to my Pokémon actually come them down, Revy. it's perfect for helping them rest.
Believe it or not, Revy, playing classical music to my Pokémon actually relieves their stress. I usually play it to them after training.
Anna, I don't compete in the Pokémon League for money. But, if you must know, the fame brings in the most money. Promos, merchandise...
That was very immature from both of you! If any more fights break out between the both of you, I will have no choice but to bring out my Garchomp to act as peacemaker.
We're all here to play strip poker, not get into violent fisticuffs. One more outburst like that, and Garchomp will be breaking up the both of you.
I would recommend visiting the Sinjoh Ruins, Meia. It was a temple created by migrants from Sinnoh to honor Arceus, the Pokémon responsible for the world's creation.
If you're interested about creation myths, Meia, then I would recommend the Sinjoh Ruins. It was built as a place of worship for the Pokémon of creation, Arceus.
I seriously doubt I'd ever become a competent pilot, Meia, but I think it would be interesting to tag along with your crew, just to see how life in space is like.
My chances of becoming a pilot, let alone a serviceable one is quite slim, Meia. However, going with your crew might be a good learning experience.
It's not often I meet a blue-haired person, Meia. I've had both good and bad experiences with blue-haired people. Long story.
I haven't met someone who's hair color is naturally blue, Meia, but I know some people that dye their hair blue. I've had good memories with some of them, and bad memories with the others.
I'm afraid I don't have any experiences in that matter, Meia... Let's just say I've been quite busy in my endeavors to get sidetracked with that.
Ah, yes, dating men... It just so happens to be one of those things that I haven't experienced yet... You could say that I've been career-oriented in my life.
Oh, seducing men... I'm afraid seduction simply isn't my way of interacting with men, Jura, so I can't really offer much help with your situation.
I... I haven't tried seducing men before, Jura... You'd probably have more luck in trying than I would...
I can't speak for all women... but I'd say hugging them tightly might be a good idea. Some hand-holding would be good too.
Wait, was that supposed to be a fight? For a second there, I thought you two were doing... a different type of physical activity.
That was rather... intimate for a fight... if you can even call it a fight... Looks like you two enjoyed the intimacy, though.
Oh, are you checking your work schedule on your tablet, Meia? You don't happen to have any appointments after this game, do you?
A laser ring... I remember an artifact we found: a ring with a tiny knife hidden inside. Not particularly useful for actual use, but it's interesting that such a device was created.

That wouldn't be the first time I've seen a weapon disguised as a ring. We once received a gun fashioned into a ring, as a donated artifact, and it had allegedly blown off the user's fingers when used.
Some countries still have kings and queens, while others have abolished the monarchy. Does Sinnoh have a monarchy? Who knows? I certainly don't.
You mentioned something about your friend investigating a "Void Century", Nami. Can you elaborate on that?
Lucario is one of my Pokémon, Nami. I've had him since I was a teenager. This is the longest I've been separated from him, and it's making me worry.
You mentioned many different types of ruins dotting your homeland, Dust. Do you have any knowledge about the history behind them?
I'm afraid I have never heard of the Moonblood legend you are referring to, Dust. What does the legend say, and how does it connect to you?
Considering how exciting it is for me to learn about the more discreet side of history, I can't imagine how big of a revelation it must be for you, Meia.
Oh, there's definitely a lot of lewd artifacts on this planet, Meia. You can't excavate at an archaeological site without digging up one. Of course, we can't display them.
Meia, that colonization story of yours sounds like a modern version of a creation story. I'd be grateful if you can indulge some details of that story.
That's an intriguing offer, Meia. I was planning on returning to the Sinjoh Ruins, to study the Mystri Stage. It's said that the world will be reborn there.
Is that true, Meia? Is your version of history really that horribly altered? That's the ultimate nightmare for someone who studies history.
Does your planet's version of Earth history really omit men, Meia? How did they accomplish that? Regrettably, Earth's history is centered around male figures.
Hold on, Meia. Did you say that Earth has achieved galactic colonization? It seems that I was so focused on studying the past that I didn't notice the future arriving.
Sounds like that would be an interesting period of your planet's history to study, Meia. It's not at all different from studying Earth's history through archaeology.
Your statement makes me wonder how many manuscripts and engravings I've read in the past also alter history like your planet did, Meia. Very intriguing.
Ah, yes, that type of rule have existed all throughout history, and there are some that still exists today. It says a lot about human nature, doesn't it, Meia?
I suppose that's a sensible move, Meia. I remember a similar situation in the past where communities on separate islands are connected solely by trading ships.
The manuscript was probably allegorical in nature, Meia. There was that one instance where a young trainer produced an egg with the help of an Arceus. Perhaps that's what reborn means.
Oh, that's a very interesting and well-written prophecy, Dust. From the sound of it, you were destined for greatness. Have you fulfilled the prophecy yet?
"Wars of Unification". So many great empires have risen and fallen through warfare. Sinnoh is fortunate to have been relatively peaceful in its history.
I somehow doubt we're fictional, Mary, because how can you explain our presence here? Besides, a competent writer would have made me easier to beat.
There are many archaeologists like you, Mary. I do think that part of the appeal of archaeology is being able to travel the world as part of the studies.
History isn't always clean and pretty, and there are many details that people would rather not know. I'm interested in hearing more from you, Mary.
History is filled with examples of leaders choosing honor before reason, leading to unnecessary bloodshed. I'm happy it didn't go that way, Mary.
All of those things you listed are horrible, Mary. I do hope things have changed for the better.
That's great news, Jessie! I always say that explorations are more interesting with a traveling companion. What time are you available, and do you have a particular cave in mind?
That's good to hear, Jessie! I don't know about cabbage fields, but there's a couple of caves that I'm think of exploring. What date can you go?
Oh, you live near a cave system, Jessie? That just sounds perfect! I suppose I can spare some time later tonight and do some preliminary surveys.
You mentioned that your house is a short distance away from a cave system, Jessie? That's an opportunity. I can do some analysis on the cave entrance this evening.
That creation story you've mentioned might not be as far-fetched as you think, Jessie. I do remember reading a similar myth once. Want to hear it?
You're friend might be onto something there, Jessie. I do recall reading an ancient creation myth similar to that. I can tell the story if you're interested.

I must warn you that this a rather lengthy but gripping story, Jessie, but you can tell me to stop any time if you want. To preface, this came from an ancient manuscript that preceded all of the current political entities. Anyway, here's the story: Stewie already has a time machine built in which he uses to go back in time to get back and embarrass Brian. When Brian finds out, they fight in the time machine, pressing random buttons and switches which makes the machine glitch. It transports them outside of the space-time continuum; non-existence; no past, present, or future; no universe; a blank canvas. Stewie has his return pad that will bring them back to wherever they want to go by locking on to their coordinates. However, it operates on the laws of physics and since they are outside the space-time continuum, there are no laws of physics; they can create their own physics. The only way to get back home is taking a risk that could result in their deaths: overloading the return pad’s reactor to release enough energy to blow them back into the universe. The explosion is successful in propelling them back into reality. A few days later, Stewie brings Brian a diagram of the Big Bang Theory’s cosmic background radiation compared to the energy spectrum of the return pad and they match exactly. This means that the return pad’s explosion was the Big Bang. Stewie explains that time and space didn’t exist before their explosion as they were outside the space-continuum. This is due to a temporal causality loop where the universe created Stewie so he could create the universe, so it could create him and on and on. We are then introduced to a character, Bertram, who finds out about Stewie’s time machine and uses it to go back in time to kill Leonardo Da Vinci, Stewie’s ancestor, essentially killing Stewie and erasing him from history. This creates ripples in time in the present that originated from the past. Although this wouldn’t happen with an ordinary person ceasing to exist, Stewie was the one who created the universe. By erasing him from history, he wouldn’t be there to create the universe, meaning it never existed. To stop this, Stewie and Brian travel back to before Bertram killed his ancestor. Stewie and Bertram’s history goes far back, as they are both children of Peter. Therefore, Bertram couldn’t just kill Peter or a recent ancestor on Peter’s side as he too would cease to exist, so he had to go back enough generations to snuff Stewie’s genus without snuffing out his own. Bertram finally arrives and him and Stewie begin to battle each other for Da Vinci’s life. Bertram succeeds in killing Da Vinci where after Stewie also kills Bertram. However, Stewie and Brian are still alive, meaning there is still a chance of him being born. He must have done or will do something to save the universe. He figures since Da Vinci’s DNA is inside of him, he himself can pass it on, taking Da Vinci’s place. This is a large chance but the only way to find out is to send Brian back to the present. When Brian arrives, everything is still intact, meaning Stewie succeeded. Brian receives a letter from The Vatican that was left by “Da Vinci” 500 years ago. It reads that Stewie placed himself into a cryogenic stasis device and is buried in the basement of their home. Brian goes to dig him up and sure enough Stewie is there.
